script.dialog: This Unit must interrupt your current dream sequence with important information.
This Unit will now explain the unique rules of a |C3|fortress battle.|C0|
|C3|Fortress battles|C0| are a special type of |C3|shy battle|C0| where you must navigate a monster's fortress.
|C3|Fortress monsters|C0| will hold your combo the same as any |C3|shy monster|C0| would, however there is a major difference.
Fortresses have many breakable traps and turrets with very high defenses, but very low mote yield.
You may safetly allow these traps to leave the arena without losing your combo.
Your main goal will be to break the |C3|special minions|C0| that guard the fortress.
These |C3|special minions|C0| will stand out in appearance from other breakable parts in the fortress.
The combo will only drop if a |C3|special minion escapes without receiving love.|C0|
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Look for this fortress monster's special minions, and do not allow any of them to escape.
That is all the information on |C3|fortress battles|C0| that This Unit has for you.
This Unit is experiencing a sudden rise in temperature.
There exists no fortress that can keep out this amount of love.
